title: 4.3 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create an HTML file with JavaScript written inside the body tag, such that it produces an output similar to the following:
Linear equation with one variable : 3x+6=0
Write the JavaScript code, such that the numbers in the linear equation keep changing every time you refresh the web page, thus producing various linear equations with one variable. The condition is that the constants produced should fall between 0 and 10, excluding 0 and 10.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
